docs.title: Contact Me
docs.text: I’d love to hear from you! Whether you have a project in mind, a question, or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out. Here’s how you can get in touch:

docs.title: 🗨️ Social Media
docs.text:

  • GitHub: Muhile

docs.title: Work with Me
docs.text: I’m always open to new opportunities and collaborations. If you’re interested in working together, please share a bit about your project, and let’s see how we can bring it to life.

docs.title: Resume
docs.text: HANSEN MUHILE

docs.title: SUMMARY
docs.text: Experienced System Administrator with a background in supporting ETL and BI teams. Skilled in systems administration, IT operations, and help desk support. Dedicated to continuous learning and always looking for ways to improve and add value to my team and organization.

docs.title: TECHNICAL SKILLS
docs.text:
• BI & ETL Platforms: Tableau, Power BI, IBM Cognos, Informatica PowerCenter
  • Programming Languages: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Java, SQL, Python (in progress), Yaml
  • Cloud Technologies: AWS, Azure, Power BI Gateway
  • Systems & Tools: Windows, Linux, Active Directory, SQL Developer, SSMS, Zabbix, Git, Docker
  • Automation: Scripting, Process Automation, CI/CD
  • Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL(in progress)
  • Customer Support: Technical Support, User Training, Troubleshooting, Documentation

docs.title: University Of Missouri System Nov 2022 – Present
docs.text:
System Administrator

  • Collaborate with internal and external teams to install, configure, upgrade, and maintain ETL & BI tools, including Tableau, Power BI, IBM Cognos and Informatica PowerCenter.
  • Led the decommissioning of Tableau, coordinating with stakeholders and users to migrate them to Power BI, resulting in a streamlined BI ecosystem and reducing operational costs.
  • Automating key processes and applications reducing manual intervention, setup time and increasing operational efficiency.
  • Maintain the Power BI on-premise gateway, ensuring seamless synchronization between on-premise and cloud data, supporting real-time reporting for over 5 campuses.
  • Monitor server infrastructure and resource usage, proactively addressing issues and ensuring optimal performance and availability.
  • Develop and maintaining comprehensive documentation, reducing troubleshooting time and standardizing application administration.

docs.title: MidwayUSA Jan 2021 – Nov 2022
docs.text:
Help Desk Technician

  • Provided first-level technical support to employees, diagnosing and resolving hardware and software issues, resulting in a reduced downtime.
  • Conducted IT training for all new salaried employees, covering company technology, equipment usage, proper technology conduct, and IT-related policies, leading to a smoother on boarding process.
  • Participated in on-call rotations, ensuring 24/7 support and minimizing service interruptions during after-hours.
  • Led the technology deployment for a new distribution center, completing the project 2 weeks ahead of schedule, which improved operational readiness and enhanced customer satisfaction.
  • Implemented security protocols such as 2FA/MFA across remote workstations and Azure AD, significantly reducing the risk of cyber threats.

docs.title: See-Saws-Run, LLC Oct 2018 – Jan 2021
docs.text:
IT Support Specialist

  • Provided technical support, resolving a wide range of technical issues.
  • Maintained and configured printers, resulting in more efficient operations and reduced delays in product shipments.
  • Conducted cost-effective research to procure new laptops and peripherals, reducing IT supply costs and improving the quality of the equipment.

docs.title: University of Missouri 2026
docs.text:
Master of Business Administration (MBA)

  • Certificate: Marketing Analytics

docs.title: Brigham Young University – Idaho Graduated Jul 2020
docs.text:
Bachelor of Science in Computer Information Technology

Pursued and earned my undergraduate degree in Computer Information Technology and learned technical skills in the following areas:

  • Databases
  • Networking
  • Programming
  • System Administration
  • Cyber Security
  • Application Development
  • Web Development

Activities and societies: BYU-I CSA

docs.title: CERTIFICATIONS
docs.text:
• Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals – Microsoft, [2023]
  • LPI Linux Essentials – LPI, [2022]
  • CompTIA Network+ - CompTIA, [2022]
  • CompTIA A+ - CompTIA, [2021]

docs.title: MkDocs Portfolio Website
docs.text:
• Developed a personal portfolio website using MkDocs to showcase my technical projects and skills.
  • Technologies Used: Visual Studio Code, MkDocs, Python, GitHub Pages, Markdown, Material for MkDocs.
  • Link: Muhile.github.io

docs.title: Homelab Setup and Self-Hosting
docs.text:
• I built and currently maintain a homelab environment, experimenting with a variety of open-source technologies to manage and secure a personal network and self-hosted services.
  • Technologies Used: OPNsense, TrueNAS, Nginx Proxy Manager, Let's Encrypt, Docker, Proxmox.

docs.title: AWS Cloud Practitioner Practice
docs.text:
• Studied and practiced AWS cloud concepts through hands-on experience using a free AWS account.
  • Gained experience in key AWS services including EC2, S3, IAM, and RDS.
  • Practiced setting up and managing basic cloud infrastructure, implementing security best practices, and managing user permissions.
  • Developed a strong understanding of cloud fundamentals, billing, and cost management.

docs.title: Career Summary
docs.text: Currently a System Administrator supporting applications and servers for the ETL and BI teams. I have experience in systems administrations, help desk support and IT operations. I continuously look for ways and resources to learn and improve myself both personally and professionally. With the knowledge I have and seek, I aim to provide positive value to teams I work with and to society.
